ISSUE.TITLE: UI issue in Google Authenticator Configure
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Admin login > configuration >Authentication 2. Select multi-factor authentication from the menu as you can see in the screen shot UI issue [Screen shot](https://prnt.sc/22ciuv4)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5996 Fixed master checkbox for tables built without DataTables template
